missions.name: The Jewel Store Job
missions.description: This mission marks the player's first big heist in the game. As Michael, the player must plan and execute a robbery at a high-end jewelry store to pay off a debt. They have the choice to go in loud with guns blazing or take a stealthier approach with smart planning and precise execution.

missions.name: Three's Company
missions.description: In this mission, Michael, Franklin, and Trevor team up for a daring extraction in downtown Los Santos. The trio must kidnap a federal agent under the guise of an official helicopter raid. This high-action mission requires players to coordinate between sniper support and helicopter piloting to achieve success.

missions.name: Blitz Play
missions.description: In Blitz Play, players undertake a mission inspired by classic heist movies. Michael, Franklin, and Trevor work together to hijack a security truck by causing a massive traffic collision. This brute-force approach requires strategic placement of the crew and vehicles, along with timed execution to fend off law enforcement and secure the loot.
